app_metadata.description: Navidrome is a personal streaming service

host_mounts.description: Sound device. Only when local playback is enabled.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Navidrome

attrs.label: Local Playback
attrs.description:
Enable local playback.</br>
This will allow you to play music from your local machine, by mounting</br>
the sound card to the container.</br>

attrs.label: Welcome Message
attrs.description: The welcome message to display on the login page.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Navidrome.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Navidrome files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Navidrome files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for Navidrome WebUI

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Navidrome Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Navidrome Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

1.1.1.readme:
Navidrome

Navidrome is a personal streaming service

Additional configuration options can be defined via environment variables. See more information on the Navidrome Documentation
